title: Ep 228 | Jaseâ€™s 'Funniest Home Videos' Moment, Cultural Clashes, and Remembering Rush Limbaugh | Ep 228
description:
Phil, Jase, and Al are stuck at home in the snow. Jase finds out why it's a bad idea for rednecks to run on ice, and his come-to-Jesus moment with a house full of teenagers goes too far. Phil is cut off from civilization. Al and Zach remember Rush Limbaugh and the huge impact he had on conservatism and new media. Al wants to know why the Biden administration replaced "equality" with "equity." And Zach takes a biblical look at division and cultural clashes.
